result: Africa has also served as a starting point for very successful comedies such as "Ace Ventura: A Crazy in Africa". The animation "The Lion King" of Disney, the most successful American movie set in Africa, was not even cast in humans. Hollywood movies about Africa are in the clich√©. Film production referred to in the text contributes to the constitution of a memory about Africa and its inhabitants. This memory emphasizes and neglects, respectively, the following aspects of the African continent:
